title: Bloomberg Markets: Galen Moore Sees Digital Currency Bubble
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Galen Moore Sees Digital Currency Bubble
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Galen Moore\u0010Chief Executive Officer\u0010Token Report\u0010Discussing the need for transparency in crypto currency/initial coin offerings and seeing a major crash coming. Bloomberg Contributor Woody Benson also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
